amendment.description: To make available, with an offset, an additional $5,000,000 for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Army, for Medium Tactical Vehicle Modifications.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2498 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2498 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S12589-12595; text: CR S12593) To make available, with an offset, an additional $5,000,000 for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Army, for Medium Tactical Vehicle Modifications.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2498 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2498 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Levin.
